data.lyric:
[ti:Hot Now (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:AI YoungBoy 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hot Now (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:02.18]Lyrics by：Kentrell Gaulden/Marcus Jermaine Gotch Jr./Kevon Lewis
[00:04.36]Beat Execs
[00:07.29]Guwap
[00:10.55]Marcuss you killin' the beat
[00:11.43]Keep up I like it drive me all insane
[00:16.37]N***as want to test us 45 sidekick
[00:19.60]You can try to cuff I let it up and bust your brain
[00:24.00]Choppers out many men baow baow
[00:26.58]Baby girl I need that fan 'cause I'm hot now
[00:29.45]Broke a*s n***as with that playin'
[00:31.01]They get shot down
[00:31.95]Plenty money b***h come on my land
[00:33.71]See what I got now
[00:34.75]Get shorty on them Xans
[00:35.86]She get to spinnin' like a lighthouse
[00:37.85]I'm walkin' through the mall
[00:38.89]I'm tryna figure what the hype 'bout
[00:40.54]You dumb lil' n***a
[00:41.59]I ain't with that talkin'
[00:42.70]You'll get packed out
[00:43.61]Shorty tryna to f**k
[00:44.37]I told her hurry
[00:45.09]She gon' pull up now
[00:45.97]She said
[00:46.28]Where you get your car 'Cause I like it
[00:48.78]I said That's funny
[00:49.90]It don't cost that much
[00:51.27]She said
[00:51.64]Why you totin' that gun I'd rather you just fight kid
[00:54.26]'Cause the day I put it down'll be the day I'm out of luck
[00:58.20]B***h give me the recipe this s**t is gettin' the best of me
[01:01.10]I need a beat through the headphones
[01:03.84]This money it ain't s**t to me
[01:05.34]Your b***h'll dig a ditch for me
[01:06.63]Plus he'll bat you in your s**t with that chrome
[01:09.24]I pulled up jumped out loaded geeked
[01:11.26]B***h don't come approach the heat
[01:12.58]I'm focused n***a what the f**k you on
[01:14.97]Two hundred thousand in the bag on me
[01:17.12]Fortnite is the last release
[01:18.21]They got the nerve to still be dissin' in they songs
[01:20.51]They ain't even on
[01:22.28]Choppers out many men baow baow
[01:24.76]Baby girl I need that fan 'cause I'm hot now
[01:27.67]Broke a*s n***as with that playin' they get shot down
[01:30.13]Plenty money b***h come on my land see what I got now
[01:32.34]She said Where you get your car 'Cause I like it
[01:35.45]I said That's funny it don't cost that much
[01:37.83]N***as wanna test us 45 sidekick
[01:41.17]I hope these f**k n***as came with some luck
[01:44.34]Keep up I like it drive me all insane
[01:49.46]N***as want to test us 45 sidekick
[01:52.65]You can try to cuff I let it up and bust your brain
[01:56.39]Mmh ah
[01:57.10]Choppers out many men baow baow
[01:59.58]Baby girl I need that fan 'cause I'm hot now
[02:02.54]Broke a*s n***as with that playin'
[02:04.00]They get shot down
data.trans:
[ti:Hot Now (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:AI YoungBoy 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.18]//
[00:04.36]MarcussMuzik Of Beat Execz制作
[00:07.29]Guwap$ Of Beat Execz制作
[00:10.55]Marcuss 你的音乐太棒啦
[00:11.43]继续 我喜欢 让我失去理智
[00:16.37]有些人想要试探我们 我有好多兄弟
[00:19.60]你可以试一试 我会让你吃不了兜着走
[00:24.00]杀手登场 好多人 枪林弹雨
[00:26.58]宝贝姑娘 我需要一点粉丝 因为我现在火了
[00:29.45]喜欢胡闹的穷鬼
[00:31.01]都会被干掉
[00:31.95]很多钞票 碧池 到我的地盘来吧
[00:33.71]看看我现在的成就
[00:34.75]让小妞嗨起来
[00:35.86]她像灯塔一样旋转
[00:37.85]我走在商场里
[00:38.89]我想搞明白那些宣传都是啥意思
[00:40.54]你个傻小子
[00:41.59]我不想跟你瞎扯淡
[00:42.70]再闹 你就会被除掉
[00:43.61]小妞想和我那个
[00:44.37]我告诉她 搞快点
[00:45.09]她立马就会来找我
[00:45.97]她说
[00:46.28]你在哪儿买的这辆车 我喜欢
[00:48.78]我说 很有趣的是
[00:49.90]这车没花多少钱
[00:51.27]她说
[00:51.64]为什么你要带枪 我宁愿你赤手空拳
[00:54.26]因为如果我把枪放下 那我就会完蛋啦
[00:58.20]碧池 给我想想办法 这玩意儿让我快要受不了啦
[01:01.10]我需要耳机里响起一点动听的节奏
[01:03.84]钱对我来说不重要
[01:05.34]你的女人为了我什么都会做
[01:06.63]杀手会拿着武器把你打得满地找牙
[01:09.24]我开车来到你面前 跳下车 枪上膛 让你心慌慌
[01:11.26]碧池 不要靠近我的枪
[01:12.58]我的目标很明确 兄弟 你有什么能耐
[01:14.97]我现在包里就装了二十万
[01:17.12]我还为《堡垒之夜》创作了音乐
[01:18.21]他们依然有勇气在歌里diss别人
[01:20.51]他们根本就没什么能耐
[01:22.28]杀手登场 好多人 枪林弹雨
[01:24.76]宝贝姑娘 我需要一点粉丝 因为我现在火了
[01:27.67]喜欢胡闹的穷鬼 都会被干掉
[01:30.13]很多钞票 碧池 到我的地盘来吧 看看我现在的成就
[01:32.34]她说 你在哪儿买的这辆车 我喜欢
[01:35.45]我说 有趣的是 这车没花多少钱
[01:37.83]有些人想要试探我们 我有好多兄弟
[01:41.17]我希望这些家伙能有点好运气
[01:44.34]继续 我喜欢 让我失去理智
[01:49.46]有些人想要试探我们 我有好多兄弟
[01:52.65]你可以试一试 我会让你吃不了兜着走
[01:56.39]//
[01:57.10]杀手登场 好多人 枪林弹雨
[01:59.58]宝贝姑娘 我需要一点粉丝 因为我现在火了
[02:02.54]喜欢胡闹的穷鬼
[02:04.00]都会被干掉
